title: Where can a meteorologist get hired? - Quora

response.answer_text: I found this on-line. All About Careers in Meteorology What do Meteorologists do? Basically, meteorologists study and predict the weather and climate and its relationship on other environmental processes and the impact on our lives and economy. Specifically meteorologists can have many different jobs including daily weather forecasting, atmospheric research, teaching, broadcasting and supporting clients through private sector meteorological companies. LEARN MORE Where do Meteorologists Work?  Meteorologists work for the government, private companies, and universities. LEARN MORE
The American Meteorological Society (AMS) has a good page with jobs in Meteorology: Meteorology Jobs - AMS Career Center They have links for private and public sector jobs.
